sourcesContent: import r from"react";import o from"../popover";import{useDropdownContext as t}from"./dropdown-context";import{__DEV__ as e}from"../utils/assertion";import{jsx as i}from"react/jsx-runtime";const n=r=>{const{children:e,...n}=r,{getMenuTriggerProps:p}=t();return i(o.Trigger,{...p(n),children:e})};e&&(n.displayName="NextUI.DropdownTrigger"),n.toString=()=>".nextui-dropdown-trigger";export default n;
